page.title: 13LT.GADDESDEN SPORTS CLUB
page.content: The Sports Club was created from the football and cricket clubs on 1.10.75. The fore_runner of the Committee was the Pavilion Project Committee and the money was raised by villagers with grants from the Parish and County Councils. The Pavilion opened on 26th May 1975. Generally each section holds an annual dinner and presentation evening as well as various fund raising events such as Jumble sales and discos. The club puts great effort in coaching youngsters in cricket and tennis and in the past, football. The club's colours are bright blue and gold. The following belong to the Sports Club _ Tennis, Bowls, Cricket, Badminton, Football and Squash. Each household pays Â£2 a year subscription as well as playing fees for each individual club.
